result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lance J Meidl

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Amanda.
Cases called at 10:07 am. 
INCLUDES: 22CF69, 22CF179, 22CF366, 22CF367, 22CF808, 22CF1235, 22CF1236, 22CM34, 22CM296.
State of Wisconsin appears by ADA Lacey Coonen.  Defendant appears from MCJ, and with Attorney Francisco Araiza via telephone. 
VRCW. 

Attorney Araiza notes he is not representing defendant on the two newest files. 
SPD is currently looking for new representation for defendant; 

Defendant states there was an offer previously made by the State and wishes to proceed with it. 

NEXT DATES>>
PTC: 12/2 at 10:00 am. 
Plea/Sentencing: 12/20 at 2:40 pm. 
JT: 2/15 at 9:00 am. 

Adj: 10:14 am.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:12 pm. 
INCLUDES: 22CF1235 & 22CF1236.

Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Deft. fails to appear. Court notes deft. is incarcerated in Lincoln Co Jail - waives appearance for today's hearing.
Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed; has Atty Francisco Araiza on other open cases. 
Prelim set for 10/31/2022 to remain on calendar.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Amanda.
Cases called at 9:34 am.
INCLUDES: 22CF69, 22CF179, 22CF366, 22CF367, 22CM34, 22CM296 and 22CF808. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears via telephone from Lincoln Co Jail, and with Attorney Francisco Araiza in person.
Date and Time set for IA in 22CF808 and Motion Hearing for the others; VRCW. 

Attorney Araiza recites basis for Motion; 
State is objecting and makes argument.
Defense responds and makes argument.
Court denies Motion at this time. 


IA: 
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived. 

COURT ORDERS: 22CF808 to be added to the current $1,000 cash bond - ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): Apartments on Sternberg Ave. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
- Prints and photograph. 

>>FUTURE DATES: 
PTC is set for 7/13 at 9:20 am.
Prelim to be set at that time.


Adj: 9:40 am.

INCLUDES: 22CF69 22CF179 22CM34 22CM296 22CF366, 22CF367 & 22CF808.  No contact with victim(s):  Incredible Bank, SPS & SGS, Apartments on Sternberg Ave.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.    Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. Prints and photographs.
